author: djh
msg: Small patch to update the vcproj generator.
* build/generator/vcnet_vcproj.ezt:
Added new "sources.user_deps" property, changed debug symbols
file to match target name rather than project name, and fixed
some path quoting in the swig stuff.

author: cmpilato
msg: Re-work the copy hunt algorithm.  Again.  This time, I think we have a
working algorithm.  The belief is that all that remain are
optimizations, but some testing against real-world data in the near
future might reveal otherwise.
* subversion/libsvn_fs/tree.c
(sort_keys): New.
(find_relevant_copies): Add 'start_txn_id' and 'end_txn_id'
arguments, and change this function to loop over committed transactions
(revisions_changed_callback, txn_body_revisions_changed): Update
calls to find_relevant_copies().
(svn_fs_revisions_changed): Disallow non-revision roots.
(txn_body_copy): Change the unsupported feature error to, well,
SVN_ERR_UNSUPPORTED_FEATURE.

author: sussman
msg: * configure.in (APR_VER_REGEX, APU_VER_REGEX): require apr/apu 0.9.4.
That's the version that ships in both httpd-2.0.46 and 2.0.47.

author: kfogel
msg: Save the in-progress manual verification stuff:
* tools/cvs2svn/test-data/verification/: New directory and files.

author: sussman
msg: Fix huge memory leak in libsvn_ra_dav commits, with cmpilato.
This was triggered whenever an http:// commit added thousands of files
to the repository.  The MERGE response would stream back thousands of
<response> elements, and libsvn_ra_dav was using a *single* baton pool
to write all the vr-url's into the working copy.  So in the
post-commit processing, the svn client would grow to ~600M.  Yikes.
* libsvn_ra_dav/merge.c (merge_ctx_t): add scratchpool field.
(svn_ra_dav__merge_activity): initialize scratchpool as subpool of mc->pool.
(bump_resource, handle_resource): take a pool arg, use it.
(end_element): pass mc->scratchpool to each call to handle_resource,
and clear it when done.
